title: 32 Degrees Heat Men's Lightweight Crew Baselayer Top | Form Fitting | Long Sleeve| 4-Way Stretch | Thermal
description: FABRIC: 40% Polyester - 34% Acrylic - 22% Rayon - 4% Spandex - Lightweight knit with a lot of stretch. The acrylic blend adds additional lightweight warmth that is comfortable against the body.
CARE INSTRUCTIONS: Wash Cold Gentle Cycle With Like Colors, Non-Chlorine Bleach Only, Tumble Dry Low, Iron Cool (if needed), Do Not Dry Clean
FITTED: Please refer to photo size chart for chest, waist, hips, and length measurements. Meant to be fitted to accommodate wearing under clothes. 28.5" Body Length (Size M)
